## TextElementsRenderer.clearRenderStates() method

Reset the current text render states of all visible tiles. All \[\[TextElement\]\]s will fade in after that as if they have just been added.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearRenderStates(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
